rows.label: qev013203_MSG0001
rows.name:
Corwin here. How goes it?
You find the Ensanguined Font yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Corwin that you are there now.

rows.label: qev013203_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Corwin if you are in the right location.

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0002
rows.name: Yeah? That was fast! I'm impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0003
rows.name:
Yeah, I can confirm it. That's the Ensanguined Font,
all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0004
rows.name:
Stings a little to say, but looks like you beat us
this time arou—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, speak of the devil. Bates is on the horn
right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Come in? Bates, respond! ...What?
Say that again, Bates! What's happening there?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0008
rows.name:
Bates! Can you hear—
Dammit! I lost the signal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0009
rows.name:
Sorry, [ST:playername ]. Situation's changed.
You may be in danger there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013203_MSG0010
rows.name:
Get yourself back to the city, ASAP!
...Dammit, Bates. What the hell is this black Skell
you were going on about?[ST:wait ]
